zh_CN: 优里那个画面到现在还在我的脑子里...(°_°)
en: That scene with Yuri is still in my head... (°_°)

zh_CN: 太可怕了！我第一次见那种场面！！
en: It was so terrifying! It was the first time I’ve ever seen something like that!! (°ロ°)

zh_CN: 而且我简直不敢相信，你居然在那里呆了一个周末！？(⊙ロ⊙)
en: And I can hardly believe it—YOU actually stayed there for an entire weekend!? (⊙ロ⊙)
